constants.constant: SELECT Incident WHERE org_id = :contact->org_id AND caller_id = :contact->id

properties.comment: /** * Persistent classes for a CMDB * * @copyright Copyright (C) 2010-2012 Combodo SARL * @license http://opensource.org/licenses/AGPL-3.0 */

field.filter: SELECT Service AS s JOIN lnkCustomerContractToService AS l1 ON l1.service_id=s.id JOIN CustomerContract AS cc ON l1.customercontract_id=cc.id WHERE cc.org_id = :this->org_id AND s.status != 'obsolete'
SELECT ServiceSubcategory WHERE service_id = :this->service_id AND request_type = 'incident' AND status != 'obsolete'
SELECT Incident WHERE id != :this->id AND status NOT IN ('resolved','closed')

method.comment: /** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() instead * @return void */
/** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() instead * @return void */
/** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() and SetElapsedTime() instead * @return void */
/** * To be deprecated: use SetCurrentDate() instead * @return void */
/** * Cascade the resolution to child User Request and Incidents * @return true (returning false would stop the ongoing transition) */
/** * Resolve the ticket from another resolved ticket * @return void */

dashlet.title: UI-IncidentManagementOverview-IncidentByPriority-last-14-days
dashlet.query: SELECT Incident WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) < start_date

dashlet.title: UI-IncidentManagementOverview-Last-14-days
dashlet.query: SELECT Incident WHERE DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) < start_date

dashlet.title: UI-IncidentManagementOverview-OpenIncidentByStatus
dashlet.query: SELECT Incident WHERE status NOT IN ('closed','rejected')

dashlet.title: UI-IncidentManagementOverview-OpenIncidentByAgent
dashlet.query: SELECT Incident WHERE status NOT IN ('closed','rejected')

dashlet.title: UI-IncidentManagementOverview-OpenIncidentByCustomer
dashlet.query: SELECT Incident WHERE status NOT IN ('closed','rejected')

menu.oql: SELECT Incident WHERE agent_id = :current_contact_id AND status NOT IN ("closed","resolved")
SELECT Incident WHERE status IN ("escalated_tto", "escalated_ttr") OR escalation_flag="yes"
SELECT Incident WHERE status NOT IN ("closed")
